name: Life is Short (ShortLivedStudios)
description:
Life is Short is a speed game, players must complete each level without exploding.  To avoid death the player can transfer to new blocks and extend their timer. New blocks can have different abilities to aid in traversal. Each option at your disposal must be put to use to overcome obstacles that will attempt to stop you at every step.

Controls:

  • Right-click to move to the mouse
  • Left-click to dash/throw
  • Space to reset level
  • esc to pause the game
  • WASD can be used for movement although just a mouse or joystick is recommended

This has been an on-and-off passion project over the last few years. I hope you will enjoy the final iteration.
